dtResponses.response: ehh?
I am sorry but I did not understand you.
My Lady, your speech is too eloquent for me.
My Lord, please speak in words my simple ears can understand.
so, what now?
huh. How about that.
Me mum found a cat today.
*looks confused*
*blank stare*
Do you think it will rain?
I don't know.
Are you talking to me?
I was just thinkn about goin to the pub and havin meself a nice warm beer.
What were we talking about?
Maybe it's time to take some action.
My name is {0}.
{0} is my name, and yours?
My name is my own. Call me what you will.
You can call me {0}.
Good to meet you.
Ah! {1}, a woman of renown I am sure!
{1}, a strong name worthy of one such as you.
May the Virtues keep you.
*nods*
*nods*
*waves*
Hello
Hail and well met!
*gasp*
*laughs* You know me not?
Farewell {1}!
Fare thee well m'lord!
Fare thee well m'lady!
Farewell my lord. Blessings upon you!
Hail m'lady!
Hail m'lord!
Hello there!
A pleasure to meet you {1}.
{1}, ah such a beautiful name for such a beautiful woman!
{1}, such a strong name!
Who are you that you require my name?
Don't waste my time any longer.
Why it's {0}, your eyes are dim my friend!
May the Virtues guide you m'lady.
Farewell
Goodbye
Well met!
Greetings!
{1} fine, so you shall be known.
*looks startled*
Do you know Tristam from Moonglow? I don't much like the look of those dogs of his. Look like they might have some hellhound blood in them.
*hic* did you know *hic* in the future *hic* theres gonna be *hic* these flying boats *hic*
Theres something funny about Renaldo and Heath. They both served in the Royal Navy for three years, when they got back, they bought a house together on Verity Isle.
Marianna has been hoarding reagents for longer than I can remember, Not quite sure when she's expecting the world to end, but I imagine if it doesn't she could open up a reagent shop and retire.
*hic* rumors? *hic* yeah a few I know *hic* oh hang on--
Rumors? I have better things to do than gossip all my time away, and so do you. Now kindly take your leave.
Rumors? Nay Sir, I'm not privy to such things
Rumors? No, My Good Lady, I haven't heard anything worth telling.
Sure I've heard a few rumors, Have you heard the one about what happened to the annoying bloke who wouldn't leave me alone?
There's something not quite right about Kendrick. He was just never the same person after he came back from Serpent's Isle. Touched in the head maybe.
I hear weird noises coming from Edmunds house at night. Not quite sure what he's up to. Funny character if you ask me...
I wouldn't trust anyone delving in the art of necromancy. Something's just unsettling about the whole subject if you ask me.
Strange ships have been coming in to port in the dead of night. Not sure what they be carrying, but the dockworkers are pretty hush about it if you ask them.
People say Gaston used to be a brigand, but I don't believe he's ever hurt a soul
I probably shouldn't tell you this, but Dominic, Captain of the Night Watch, has been known to pilfer coin from unsuspecting people.
I feel sorry for Sarah, her Ma passed away, and ever since her Father's been a useless lout, always drinking, never working, the poor girls having to feed the both of them on her own.
Maurita is a very handsome woman, I envy her husband
I hear shouting all the time at the Bennett's house. Oh how I do pity that poor woman being married to that imbecile.
Clement dissapears often for long periods of time. Wonder hat he's up too. Not entirely bright, that one, I hope he's not mixed up in anything.
Nash and Sarah seem to have seperated. Good thing, if you ask me, He was way too good for her
Sure I know Rumor or two. Don't look like I'd tell them to the likes of you, now does it?
I'm a Tailor by trade. I make all the gold while me husband drinks it away in the tavern.
What I do ain't none of thy business. Now leave me be.

I'm a Farrier, though I'm taking a bit of a break right about now. Got a nasty kick a while back, Me wife healed it as best she could, but it weren't a very strong potion, reagents aren't exactly cheap on my salary.
I'm a Thief. Now leave me to my lonesome, lest you wish your possesions to cease being yours.
Why I'm a fortune teller. I see thee being injured very soon if thou dost not take thy leave.
I'm a Craftsman of sorts. Leather, light metal work, pottery, mostly decorative stuff. Alot of people say its a soft job, but why spend my life making the same curiasses day after day?
I'm a Royal Gardener, I tend after the plants in Lord British' Castle Courtyard. It's a very prestigous job, I'll have you know.
I'm a Blacksmith, me guilds on strike now, so I'm on a bit of an involuntary vacation.
I'm a Mercenary, but I haven't had much luck finding work of late. Too much damn peace in the world for my tastes.
I'm a Courier, If your guilds got messages it needs sent fast and discreetly, I'm the man for the job!
I'm a Courier, If your guild has got messages it needs sent fast and discreetly, I'm the girl for the job!
I really don't like to get into specifics before receiving payment *winks*
I'm an Artist, I'd offer to paint a portrait of you, but I doubt the canvas could take the agony.
My dear woman, you have a face so beautiful, that my skills as an Artist would do it little justice.
I'm an Apprecentice Mage on assignment from the Council in Magincia. Have you thought of joining the Council? It's fascinating work, really.
I wasn't aware that what I did for a living was any of thy business.
What do I do for a living? I avoid answering questions from complete strangers. Now kindly take your leave before I hex you something fierce.
I'm a Monk from Empath Abbey, its an easy enough life, once you get over the vow of chasity.
I'm just a Farmer, I was in the Royal Navy before, but me Pa died and left me a bit o' land, so I decided to put it to good use.
Me, I'm an Alchemist. It's decent coin, and I've only lost a few fingers
I'm a Bard at the Royal Conservatory
I'm a Carpenter, its an easy enough trade for someone who likes working with their hands.
I'm a Blacksmith, my dear lady.
I'm a Soldier, and I Apologize but I must take my leave. Good Day Citizen.
I'm a Seamstress, and I have a wedding to do, excuse me.
I'm a Shipwright, sorry I don't take orders from citizens, I have my hands busy with military contracts at the moment.
I'm the Royal Librarian, sorry too busy to talk
I'm an Alchemist, and I'm very busy. Good Day
I'm a Blacksmith, my good sir
I'm a Monk, if you'll excuse me I'll get back to my medititation
*looks at the sun*
*looks at the moon*
It is early yet
Why, it is afternoon...
Evening time it is! Where's the pub?
It is too late to be about I'm afraid!
All I know m'lord, is the sun is out
All I know m'lady, is the sun is out
And a glorious day it is!
Daytime, that's all I know.
It is past time for us to be about!
